isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Seals for 5000 i and 9000 i Series

step1.para: Unlatch fiberglass tilt hood on both sides and raise hood to full open position.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 15 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove hood seal (Item 1) from cowl tray (Item 2) by pulling it off cowl tray flange starting at one end or the other. Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 15. Hood Seal for 5000 i and 9000 i Series

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Seals for 5000 i SBA Series with Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Unlatch hood latches on both sides and raise left and right side hood to full open position.

Remove cowl hood seal (Item 1) from cowl tray (Item 2) by starting at one end or the other and pulling it carefully off the cowl tray flange (Item 3). Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

To remove both radiator shell hood seals (Item 4) from radiator shell flange (Item 5), remove two sheet metal screws, flat washers and speed nuts (Item 6) and remove both brackets with seal pads (Items 7 and 8, view in circle A) from top of radiator shell. Remove two sheet metal screws, flat washers and speed nuts (Item 9) and remove bracket with seal pad (Items 10 and 11, view in circle B) from the side of the radiator shell, driver side shown. Repeat for passenger side. Save sheet metal screws, flat washers and speed nuts for reinstallation, if not damaged.

If it is necessary to replace seal pad (Item 8, view in circle A) on bracket (Item 7, view in circle A) or seal pad (Item 11, view in circle B) on bracket (Item 10, view in circle B), remove two push-in fasteners (Item 13, view in circle A and circle B) and remove it from bracket (Item 7, view in circle A) or (Item 10, view in circle B). Save push-in fasteners for reinstallation, if not damaged.
Remove both radiator shell hood seals (Item 4) by carefully pulling on hood seals at each push-in fastener to remove them. Save hood seals for reinstallation, if not damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 16. Hood Seals for 5000 i SBA Series with Optional Butterfly Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. SHEET METAL SCREW, FLAT WASHER AND SPEED NUT
9. SHEET METAL SCREW, FLAT WASHER AND SPEED NUT
14. FOURTH AND FIFTH HOLES ON RADIATOR SHELL FLANGE
15. FIRST AND SECOND HOLES ON RADIATOR SHELL SIDE FLANGE
